FuncDef:
The tracert-livetime command sets the lifetime of a trace test instance.
The undo tracert-livetime command restores the default lifetime. The tracert-livetime command sets the lifetime of a trace test instance. The undo tracert-livetime command restores the default lifetime. By default, the initial TTL of packets is 1, and the maximum TTL of packets is 30.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the initial TTL of packets.
The value is 1.

Specifies the maximum TTL of packets.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255. max-ttl must be greater than or equal to first-ttl

ExtraInfo: To set the minimum and maximum lifetime of a test instance, run the tracert-livetime command. This prevents endless traveling of test packets in routing on the network.
